product_name: The North Face Taggart Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The lightweight and breathable Taggart pants from The North Face will keep you comfortable on your fast-paced adventures into the mountains. Durable midweight nylon fabric has 4-way stretch for ease of movement; fabric resists abrasion that you'll likely encounter on the trail. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Welted hand pockets, a zippered thigh pocket and a zippered rear pocket secure your trail essentials. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Waistband is lined for comfort next to skin. The North Face Taggart pants have an active fit.
short_description: The lightweight and breathable Taggart pants from The North Face will keep you comfortable on your fast-paced adventures into the mountains.
